name: International Conference on Gene Editing and CRISPR Technologies
content: International Conference on Gene Editing and CRISPR Technologies (GECT 2020) Conference Date: June 19-21, 2020 Conference Venue: Xi'an, China Website: http://www.marchconf.org/conference/GECT2020/ Online Registration System: http://www.marchconf.org/RegistrationSubmission/default.aspx?ConferenceID=1210 Email: paper\_service@163.com International Conference on Gene Editing and CRISPR Technologies (GECT 2020) will be held from June 19-21, 2020 in Xi'an, China. This Conference will cover issues on Gene Editing and CRISPR Technologies. The aim for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their latest research results and advanced research methods. Invited Speakers: Prof. Xinyi Lu, Nankai University, China Prof. Tao Gong, Donghua University, China Prof. Kiyoshi NOKIHARA, HiPep Laboratories, Japan Prof. M. Michael Gromiha, Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Madras, India If you wish to serve the conference as an invited speaker, please send email to us with your CV. We'll contact with you asap.
